release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 5.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Created new staging command-line variable to allow specification of a staging directory to be fed into the PushPull API. Removed database.properties because it was leftover from rs-update and is no longer needed. Updated environment.properties with updated paths. Had to update the oodt-version Maven variable to an actual value because it was not picking it up from parent.

Added classes to pull files using SFTP, FTP, and HTTP protocols. One can specify the details for these connections using simple properties files. Added a command-line flag to filter which nodes are processed.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Basically rewrote the software to include an interface to Apache PushPull and streamlined the architecture for the report service. Includes updates to PushPull configurations for the nodes we have information on, an updated Launcher for the CLI, and accompanying units tests for most of the PushPull functionality.
Updated Unix shell script and Windows batch file to provide a more user friendly message when JAVA_HOME is not set in the environment.
